name: BETA-TEST
description:
A fpsp (First Person Shooter Parkour) it's still in it's early development this a prototype and full version will be released somwhere near March and April (Date may vary).Inspired by Dani's Karlson movement with slight diffrence.

Movement:

WASD-foward,back,right,left

SpaceBar-Jump

Double Clicking SpaceBar-Double jump

W + a/d-Wallrun

Shift-Crouch/Slide

Combined Movement

Wallrun + Double Jump

(if you read the movement you are bad gamers don't need tutorials)
